top.title: Ukraine struggling to keep lights on under Russian attack, says energy boss
top.summary: DTEK boss Maxim Timchenko says the intensity of Russian strikes is so frequent there is no time to recover.

top.title: Dashcam video shows couple trying to stop gunman before being killed in Bondi attack
top.summary: Boris Gurman, 69, "charged straight towards the danger" and grabbed one of the attacker's guns, a witness said.

top.title: Bondi Beach gunman originally from India, police say
top.summary: Sajid Akram had "limited" contact with his family in Hyderabad since moving to Australia 27 years ago, a police official said.

top.title: Downing Street insists negotiations over US-UK tech deal still live
top.summary: When the partnership was unveiled in September the UK government said it would "shape the futures of millions of people".

top.title: UK launches taskforce to 'break down barriers' for women in technology
top.summary: It comes after the government was urged to help close the UK tech sector's gender gap in order to meet its ambitious AI goals.

top.title: Amazon apologises after showing 15-rated film to child who rented PG movie
top.summary: The child was trying to watch Diary of a Wimpy Kid - but a film with "strong sex and sex references" played instead.

title.#text: Kindles make for even better gifts now most are on sale
Larry Ellison’s big dumb gift to his large adult son
